Package xyz.xenondevs.invui.window

Interface AnvilWindow.Builder.Single

All Superinterfaces:
AnvilWindow.Builder<AnvilWindow.Builder.Single>, Cloneable, Window.Builder<AnvilWindow,AnvilWindow.Builder.Single>, Window.Builder.Single<AnvilWindow,AnvilWindow.Builder.Single>
Enclosing interface:
AnvilWindow.Builder<S extends AnvilWindow.Builder<S>>
public static interface AnvilWindow.Builder.Single extends AnvilWindow.Builder<AnvilWindow.Builder.Single>, Window.Builder.Single<AnvilWindow,AnvilWindow.Builder.Single>
A single AnvilWindow builder. Combines both AnvilWindow.Builder and Window.Builder.Single for an AnvilWindow with only one Gui that does not access the Player's inventory.
See Also:
  • Window.Builder.Normal.Single
  • CartographyWindow.Builder.Single
